Inspirational Creations is a small business ran by two sisters, Robin and Denise, based in Michigan.

We specialize in creating hand-crafted products, such as:

* Laser-cut wooden signs
* Finger-knit blankets and pillows
* Custom soaps
* Engraved tumblers

and more!
